sources.title: King's Jester (1935)
sources.description: The King hasn't laughed in a long time. He's looking for a new jester, Krazy Kat goes to the Palace to apply for the position. He also takes a shine to the Princess -- looking like Kitty in a blonde wig -- and she to him. But can the two end up together when earlier applicants failed and then dragged off to the headsman? Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/kings-jester-1935/

metadata.Plot: The King hasn't laughed in a long time. He's looking for a new jester, so Krazy Kat rides a cock horse to the Palace to apply for the position. He also takes a shine to the Princess -- looking like Kitty in a blonde wig -- and she to him. But can Krazy and she get together when earlier applicants who failed to raise a smile get dragged off to the headsman?It's a fairly good entry in the series which had torn its moorings to the George Herriman comic strip a decade earlier. A redesign of the character had recently taken place, using the newer egg-based designs, and the animators were having fun stretching themselves.... and the characters.
